actions.text: Reported to House from the Committee on Rules, H. Rept. 96-269.
Measure called up by unanimous consent in House.

official_title: A resolution waiving certain points of order against H.R. 4392, a bill making appropriations for the Departments of State, Justice, and Commerce, the Judiciary, and related agencies for the fiscal year ending September 30, 1980, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Sets forth the rule for the consideration of H.R. 4392 (Departments of State, Justice, and Commerce, the Judiciary, and related agencies funding).

titles.title: A resolution waiving certain points of order against H.R. 4392, a bill making appropriations for the Departments of State, Justice, and Commerce, the Judiciary, and related agencies for the fiscal year ending September 30, 1980, and for other purposes.
